channel.title: Server Tutorial
channel.description: Ok well i want to know on how to add a server tutorial...So like when they create their account i have like a movie or like some tips for them...Is this possible? If so then please tell me...Thanks

item.title: Server Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

There’s already a Method to control the Camera in your Base most likely. It probably hasn’t been Named though. Here’s ours:

     public void cameraAction(int x, int y, int height, int speed, int angle) {
               client.outStream.createFrame(177);
               client.outStream.writeByte(x / 64); 
               client.outStream.writeByte(y / 64); 
               client.outStream.writeWord(height); 
               client.outStream.writeByte(speed); 
               client.outStream.writeByte(angle); 
     }

Read full topic
